segment.source: What's new in App-V 5.0 SP1
segment.target: What's new in App-V 5.0 SP1

segment.source: What's new in App-V 5.0 SP1
segment.target: What's new in App-V 5.0 SP1

segment.source: What's new in App-V 5.0 SP1
segment.target: What's new in App-V 5.0 SP1

segment.source: This section is for users who are already familiar with App-V and want to know what has changed in App-V 5.0 SP1.
segment.target: This section is for users who are already familiar with App-V and want to know what has changed in App-V 5.0 SP1.

segment.source: If you are not already familiar with App-V, you should start by reading Planning for App-V 5.0.
segment.target: If you are not already familiar with App-V, you should start by reading Planning for App-V 5.0.

segment.source: Changes in Standard Functionality
segment.target: Changes in Standard Functionality

segment.source: The following sections contain information about the changes in standard functionality for App-V 5.0 SP1.
segment.target: The following sections contain information about the changes in standard functionality for App-V 5.0 SP1.

segment.source: Changes to Supported Languages
segment.target: Changes to Supported Languages

segment.source: For more information, see About App-V 5.0 SP1.
segment.target: For more information, see About App-V 5.0 SP1.

segment.source: The following list contains more information about the new Language Packs:
segment.target: The following list contains more information about the new Language Packs:

segment.source: The App-V 5.0 SP1 language packs are bundled into the appvxxxsetup.exe installer for all the App-V 5.0 Components.
segment.target: The App-V 5.0 SP1 language packs are bundled into the appvxxxsetup.exe installer for all the App-V 5.0 Components.

segment.source: When you run the installer it will automatically install the most appropriate language pack based on the locale of the associated operating system running on the target computer.
segment.target: When you run the installer it will automatically install the most appropriate language pack based on the locale of the associated operating system running on the target computer.

segment.source: If additional language packs are required, you must extract these language packs from the installer by running the following command: .
segment.target: If additional language packs are required, you must extract these language packs from the installer by running the following command: .

segment.source: After this has been run, the contents of the installer are extracted to the specified location.
segment.target: After this has been run, the contents of the installer are extracted to the specified location.

segment.source: You must install the desired language pack by applying the appropriate Language pack Windows Installation file.
segment.target: You must install the desired language pack by applying the appropriate Language pack Windows Installation file.

segment.source: For example, appvhibLPjmmbx86.msi or appvhibLPjmmbx64.msi, where hib refers to the component and jmmb refers to the locale.
segment.target: For example, appvhibLPjmmbx86.msi or appvhibLPjmmbx64.msi, where hib refers to the component and jmmb refers to the locale.

segment.source: Enhanced Support for Microsoft Office 2010
segment.target: Enhanced Support for Microsoft Office 2010

segment.source: Microsoft Office 2010 Sequencing Kit for Application Virtualization 5.0 – helps provide users with a consistent experience using a virtualized version of Microsoft Office 2010.
segment.target: Microsoft Office 2010 Sequencing Kit for Application Virtualization 5.0 – helps provide users with a consistent experience using a virtualized version of Microsoft Office 2010.

segment.source: The Microsoft Office 2010 Sequencing Kit for Application Virtualization 5.0 is used in conjunction with the Microsoft Office 2010 Deployment Kit for App-V and also provides the required Microsoft Office 2010 licensing service.
segment.target: The Microsoft Office 2010 Sequencing Kit for Application Virtualization 5.0 is used in conjunction with the Microsoft Office 2010 Deployment Kit for App-V and also provides the required Microsoft Office 2010 licensing service.
